title: A Causal Lens for Evaluating Faithfulness Metrics
author: Kerem Zaman (UNC Chapel Hill), Shashank Srivastava (UNC Chapel Hill), ...
relevance_why: The paper introduces a novel framework for evaluating the faithfulness of natural language explanations in large language models, which could inform methods for improving explainability in audio processing tasks.
background: Examining how well natural language explanations from models align with their true reasoning processes, which is critical for interpretability in machine learning.
contribution: This paper introduces the CAUSAL DIAGNOSTICITY framework to assess faithfulness metrics for natural language explanations, achieving a structured evaluation that highlights the shortcomings of existing metrics.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous metrics for faithfulness often relied on simplistic consistency measures without deeply considering model reasoning.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work utilizes causal knowledge editing to generate faithful and unfaithful explanation pairs, offering a more nuanced approach.

key_innovation: Implementing causal mechanisms to produce explanations and evaluate their faithfulness metrics, leading to clearer insights on model interpretability.
real_world_impact: Advances in understanding how LLMs provide explanations can enhance user trust and application in critical fields such as healthcare and legal systems where interpretability is essential.
limitations: The effectiveness of the framework heavily depends on the quality of knowledge editing methods, which can vary across tasks.

new_terms.faithfulness metrics: **Faithfulness metrics** assess how accurately model-generated explanations reflect the underlying reasoning for predictions made by the model.
new_terms.causal diagnosticity: **Causal diagnosticity** is a framework evaluating how well faithfulness metrics distinguish between faithful and unfaithful explanations based on causal interventions.

open_sourcing: The code and dataset will be released upon acceptance.
